## ðŸš¨ Code of Conduct Violation Report

**This form is for reporting violations of our [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/Websoft9/Waterflow/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). All reports will be handled confidentially.**

### Incident Details

**What happened?**
Please provide a clear, factual description of the incident. Include:
- What was said or done
- When and where it occurred (e.g., GitHub issue #123, Discord channel, etc.)
- Who was involved (usernames, handles, or descriptions)

**Incident Description:**
[Please be as specific as possible while protecting your privacy]

### Impact Assessment

**How did this affect you or others?**
- [ ] I felt threatened or unsafe
- [ ] I witnessed harassment of others
- [ ] This created a hostile environment
- [ ] This violated community guidelines
- [ ] Other: [please specify]

**Impact Description:**
[Describe the impact on you or the community]

### Evidence

**Supporting Information:**
Please provide links, screenshots, or other evidence (optional but helpful):
- GitHub issue/PR/discussion links
- Screenshot URLs (please blur any personal information)
- Chat logs or message links
- Other relevant context

**Evidence:**
[Links, descriptions, or attachments]

### Previous Actions

**Have you attempted to resolve this directly?**
- [ ] Yes, I contacted the person involved
- [ ] Yes, I reported this to platform moderators (GitHub, Discord, etc.)
- [ ] No, this is my first report

**Resolution Attempts:**
[Describe any previous resolution attempts]

### Contact Information

**How would you like us to follow up?**
- [ ] Email (provide below)
- [ ] GitHub (use my account)

**Contact Details:**
[Your preferred contact method and information]

### Additional Context

**Anything else we should know?**
[Additional context, patterns you've noticed, or other relevant information]

---

**Privacy Notice:** Your report will be kept confidential. We will not share your personal information or the details of your report without your explicit consent, except as necessary to investigate and resolve the matter.

**Response Time:** We will acknowledge receipt within 24 hours and provide regular updates on our investigation progress.

**Support:** If you need immediate support or are in distress, please reach out to local authorities or support services in your area.

Thank you for helping maintain a safe and inclusive community.
